name: She's Coming (wronchi)
description:
(submitted for Mooncord 2020 Game Jam, made in 72 hours)

Controller recommended. This godly being has injured his back and may be be a little slow, but can still get around with a trusty hookshot. Get to the end of each stage to win. Also of note, she's coming.

Controller: (Left Stick/D Pad): Move/Aim Hookshot up or down: 
(A) Jump
(X) Hookshot

Keyboard:
[Arrow Keys]: Move/Aim Hookshot up or down 
[Z] Jump
[X] Hookshot
